title: SAM - Company Overview
content:
# SAM AI - Company Overview

## About InnovareAI (Parent Company)

**Company Name:** InnovareAI Ltd
**Product:** SAM (Sales Autonomous Machine)
**Founded:** 2024
**Headquarters:** Dublin, Ireland (with global operations)
**Website:** https://meet-sam.com

## Mission Statement

To democratize enterprise-grade sales automation, making autonomous AI-powered outreach accessible to businesses of all sizes. We believe every company deserves a tireless, intelligent sales assistant that works 24/7 to grow their pipeline.

## Vision

By 2027, SAM will be the leading AI sales co-pilot for B2B companies worldwide, generating $100M ARR while serving 50,000+ businesses across 30 countries.

## Core Values

1. **Autonomy First** - We build systems that work independently, not tools that create more work
2. **Human-in-the-Loop** - AI augments human judgment, never replaces it for critical decisions
3. **Results-Driven** - We measure success by meetings booked and revenue generated, not vanity metrics
4. **Ethical Outreach** - We respect inbox boundaries, comply with regulations, and never spam
5. **Customer Obsession** - Every feature starts with "How does this help our customers grow?"

## Company Culture

- **Remote-First:** Distributed team across Europe, Americas, and Asia-Pacific
- **Product-Led:** Engineers and product managers drive innovation
- **Data-Driven:** Decisions backed by metrics and customer feedback
- **Startup Agility:** Fast iteration cycles, weekly deployments

## Leadership

- **CEO/Founder:** Thomas von Linz - Serial entrepreneur, previously built and exited B2B SaaS company
- **CTO:** [TBD] - Leading technical architecture and AI development
- **Head of Growth:** [TBD] - Driving customer acquisition and expansion

## Contact Information

- **Sales:** hello@meet-sam.com
- **Support:** support@meet-sam.com
- **Website:** https://meet-sam.com
- **Product:** https://app.meet-sam.com

## Key Milestones

- **Q3 2024:** Beta launch with founding customers
- **Q4 2024:** Public launch with self-service tier
- **Q1 2025:** Managed service tier launched
- **Q2 2025:** LinkedIn + Email automation fully integrated
- **Q3 2025:** Target 500 paying customers

## Investor Information

Currently self-funded (bootstrapped). Series A planned for Q4 2025 to accelerate growth and expand product capabilities.

title: SAM - Product Capabilities
content:
# SAM Product Capabilities

## What SAM Does

SAM (Sales Autonomous Machine) is an AI-powered sales automation platform that handles the entire top-of-funnel sales process autonomously.

## Core Capabilities

### 1. LinkedIn Automation
- **Prospect Search:** Find decision-makers by title, company, industry, location
- **Connection Requests:** Personalized outreach with AI-generated messages
- **Follow-up Sequences:** Automated multi-touch campaigns (up to 5 follow-ups)
- **Message Monitoring:** Track replies and engagement
- **Smart Timing:** Business hours delivery, weekend/holiday avoidance

### 2. Email Campaigns
- **Multi-channel Sequences:** LinkedIn + Email coordination
- **Personalization at Scale:** AI customizes each message based on prospect data
- **Domain Warming:** Gradual ramp-up to protect deliverability
- **Bounce Handling:** Automatic cleanup of invalid emails

### 3. AI Conversation Engine
- **SAM Chat Interface:** Natural language command center
- **Context-Aware Responses:** Uses your knowledge base for accurate answers
- **Draft Generation:** AI creates reply drafts for approval
- **Human-in-the-Loop:** Critical decisions always require human approval

### 4. Knowledge Base
- **RAG-Powered Search:** Vector embeddings for intelligent retrieval
- **Multi-ICP Support:** Different content for different customer profiles
- **Document Upload:** PDF, DOCX, images with AI extraction
- **Living Knowledge:** Updates automatically from conversations

### 5. Campaign Management
- **Visual Dashboard:** Track all campaigns in one place
- **Prospect Approval:** Review and approve targets before outreach
- **Real-time Metrics:** Opens, replies, meetings booked
- **Batch Management:** Handle hundreds of prospects efficiently

## Integration Points

- **LinkedIn:** Via Unipile API (direct automation)
- **Email:** Unipile/ReachInbox integration
- **CRM (Coming Soon):** Salesforce, HubSpot, Pipedrive
- **Calendar:** Calendly/Cal.com booking links
- **Webhooks:** Custom integrations via API

## Security & Compliance

- **SOC 2 Type II:** In progress
- **GDPR Compliant:** Data stored in EU, right to erasure
- **LinkedIn Safe:** Respects rate limits, mimics human behavior
- **Multi-tenant Isolation:** Workspace-level data separation
